name: Granny Bag (small) - Create your own!
description:
Introducing the Granny Bag. This little bag is deceivingly spacious! With a wide bottom you can fit everything you need in it including wallet, cell phone, makeup pouch and more!

	Choose from a selection of boutique quality fabrics.  Just copy and paste this link to your browser:

http://www.onehappytree.com/gallery/?level=album&id=1

	::Features::

	♥ Pleated front
♥ Boutique quality fabric
♥ Matching interior and trim
♥ Key clip attached to the interior
♥ Dimensions are 14 1/”w x 9”h
♥ It has a 10” drop
♥ A wide bottom allows enough room for a variety of personal items!
♥ Reinforced with stabilizer

name: Mini Walletini - Create your own!
description: You are viewing the Mini Walletini™ a small, bi-fold wallet. This Mini Walletini™ is fun, hip and oh so cool! The best part is, this item SHIPS FREE in the USA! ::Features:: ♥ 3 interior pocket compartments; 1-credit cards, 2-business cards, 3-receipts and cash ♥ The interior pocket can hold about 25-50 business cards! ♥ Interior zippered coin pouch ♥ Reinforced with stabilizer ♥ Snap closure ♥ Measures 3 1/2”(h) x 4”(w) closed Choose from a selection of boutique quality fabrics. Just copy and paste this link to your browser to see your fabric selections: http://www.onehappytree.com/gallery/?level=album&id=1

name: Maxi Taxi Portable Maxi Pads - Create your own!
description: Create your own! Tote your maxi pads in style! Maxi Taxi™ are a great way to conceal your “goods” fashionably. I remember how hard it was in school to go to the ladies room for “female” business without any of my classmates knowing! For a while I wanted to create something cute yet functional for this very reason! ::Features:: ♥ Holds several pads on each side ♥ Customized by the dimensions of your particular pad, just send me the measurements of your pad ♥ Reinforced with stabilizer ♥ Snap closure ♥ Ships FREE in the USA ♥ You chose the exterior fabric. Just copy and paste this link to your browser for fabric selections: Choose from a selection of boutique quality fabrics. Just copy and paste this link to your browser to see your fabric selections: http://www.onehappytree.com/gallery/?level=album&id=1

name: Large Tri-Fold Wallet - Create your own!
description:
Create your very own wallet. Choose from a number of different fabrics for the interior and exterior.

	Your wallet will include:

	♥ 4 credit card holder
♥ cash pocket
♥ check book pocket
♥ pen holder
♥ zipper coin pocket in the back
♥ reinforced with stabilizer
♥ snap closure
♥ Dimensions 8 1/5” x 4 1/2” closed

	Choose from a selection of boutique quality fabrics. Just copy and paste this link to your browser to see your fabric selections:

http://www.onehappytree.com/gallery/?level=album&id=1

name: Hobo - Create your own!
description:
unction meets fashion in this trendy hobo. You choose the interior and exterior fabrics from a wonderful selection! I’m open to ideas as well. Want something unique for the appliqué? Let’s talk!

	Features include:

	♥ An appliqué to adorn the the front
♥ Zipper pocket in the interior
♥ A key clip attached to the inside
♥ Reinforced with stabilizer
♥ Magnetic snap closure
♥ 16” high x 19” across at the widest point and a 11 1/2” drop

	Choose from a selection of boutique quality fabrics. Just copy and paste this link to your browser to see your fabric selections:

	http://www.flickr.com/photos/onehappytree/ sets/72157602543790391/
